DataElement.preferredName: Average Time Regular Physical Activity Participation Minute Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The average number of minutes of participation in regular physical activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Average Time Regular Physical Activity Participation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data._The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past._Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern._Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc._The act of taking part in an activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.:The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.:Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern.:Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.

Concepts.definition: A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern.

Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.
The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: . OK to release per KM. AK 2020-10-19

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Length or duration of an event or activity measured in minutes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
